resources.string: Choose between brilliant colors or a faithful reproduction of the creator\'s intended vision to create an unforgettable visual experience
Optimize battery longevity by adjusting the maximum charging percentage and fine-tuning other charging settings

Provide a faithful reproduction of the creator\'s intended vision through high definition display and specially developed image processing compatible with BT.2020 color gamut and 10-bit color of HDR specification.

Apps that support a wide color gamut will automatically be shown in their original colors.


HDR videos in fullscreen mode will be automatically displayed with Creator Mode.
Disabling this setting will stop the device from charging

If Battery Care is enabled, the device will start charging only when the following requirements have been met:
 1. You have enabled charging by toggling "Enable Charging".
 2. Your device's battery level is lower than the charging limit you've set.


Charging stops when a specified percentage is reached to increase the lifespan of the battery.
Setting that limit to 80% yields even better results.
